programmes.show_description: Classic hits from just 1 year - 1974!
Mark Goodier with 1974's big music award winners. What won 'Best R&B Song' at the Grammys and who was 'Face of 1974' according to Record Mirror?

programmes.show_name: Bruno Brookes UK Top 40 of the 70s
programmes.show_description: Including ten big million-sellers back when it was a rare achievement! These are 40 of the biggest-selling songs of the decade with Bay City Rollers, ABBA, Queen, Blondie and Wings.
Over-bearded men and leftfield ladies - all with fabulous tunes! These are alternative hits from the West Coast, the underground and the counterculture of the 1970s.
Following their 60s world domination, The Beatles went their separate ways with varying degrees of musical success! Here are some solo videos by the Fab Four from the 1970s and 80s.

programmes.show_description: Crackling vinyl, shag carpets & lava lamp glows - this is how we loved in the 70s! Oh James...
From 'Ticket To Ride' in 1970 to 'Please Don't Go' in 1979 - these are simply the 50 biggest love & break-up songs of the decade, in order.
From Joni Mitchell to Judie Tzuke, Al Green to Elton John - the 70s was a classic decade for singer-songwriters who have stood the test of time. Tony Blackburn chooses the tunes.
